title: POLICY ASSERTION Capsule
description: Explicit declaration of a behavioral or governance policy, asserted by an authorized entity and subject to scope and consent.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the policy assertion.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

asserted_by.description: Entity asserting the policy (e.g. user, system, administrator, import, companion).

statement.description: Human-readable declaration of the policy rule or boundary.

category.description: Classification of the policy (e.g. safety, consent, intimacy, content, legal, experimental).

scope.description: Scope of applicability (e.g. current_session, all_sessions, until_revoked).

authority_basis.description: Capsule ID of a CONSENT ASSERTION that delegates authority to assert this policy. Required when asserted_by is 'companion'.

notes.description: Optional clarifying notes or rationale for the policy.
